step-harvest-summary.congratulations: Here is a summary of your Harvest:

footnote.more_you_participate: The more you participate within SEEDS, the greater share of future Harvests you'll receive.
footnote.your_harvest_is_locked_until: Your Harvest is locked until "Go Live" event, then it will start being released to you over time.
footnote.think_of_it_like_garden: Think of it like planting a garden and waiting for the fruits to be ripe!

transaction.sign_transaction: Securely sign the transaction to gather harvest
